description:
gc: delete old unsafe functions

Also update build to be able to run mkbuiltin again.
The export form has changed a little, so builtin.c has
more diffs than unsafe.go.

In CL 5650069, I just edited the documentation, a rarely
successful method of change.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=031625aa9500 ***

gc: delete old unsafe functions

Also update build to be able to run mkbuiltin again.
The export form has changed a little, so builtin.c has
more diffs than unsafe.go.

In CL 5650069, I just edited the documentation, a rarely
successful method of change.

R=ken2
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5662043

Hello ken2 (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 5662043: gc: delete old unsafe functions
